title: [Hall]
description: An elaborate plaque hangs from the brass-trimmed door in the southern wall.  Opposite the door, a pair of windows looks down into the courtyard below, although it is impossible to see much through them, due to the glare from an oil lamp resting in the iron sconce between them.

An elaborate plaque hangs from the brass-trimmed door in the southern wall of this brightly lit hallway.  A pair of windows opposite the door looks down into the courtyard below, while allowing the sunlight to play off the door's trimmings.  A thick iron sconce set between the windows holds an unlit oil lamp.
